name: European Council for an Energy Efficient Economy
goal: eceee is a membership-based non-profit association. We generate and provide evidence-based knowledge and analysis of policies, measures and technologies in the area of energy efficiency and energy savings. We facilitate co-operation and networking through our Summer Studies, workshops, and social media.
euInitiatives:
Energy Efficiency Directive
Ecodesign and Energy Labelling
Circular Economy
EPBD
Energy Efficiency First intiative
